action.text: Amendment SA 2588 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2588 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 62. Record Vote Number: 338.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2588.
Amendment SA 2588 proposed by Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S13092-13095, S13124-13125) To eliminate child poverty.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2588 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 62. Record Vote Number: 338.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2588 proposed by Senator Kennedy.
